result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasalExcuse me, sir.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal a ḋuine uasalExcuse me, sir.

result.eng: The news spread from person to person.
result.ga: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine
result.orig: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine
result.html: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.
result.ponchtml: Scaip an scéal ó ḋuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.

result.eng: The lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ga: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.orig: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.html: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ponchtml: Tá na soilse lasta aċ níl aon ḋuine sa ḃaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.

result.eng: Membership for adults is five euros.
result.ga: Tá cúig euro ar bhallraíocht do dhuine fásta
result.orig: Tá cúig euro ar bhallraíocht do dhuine fásta
result.html: Tá cúig euro ar bhallraíocht do dhuine fástaMembership for adults is five euros.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúig euro ar ḃallraíoċt do ḋuine fástaMembership for adults is five euros.

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ga: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.orig: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.html: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ponchtml: Ní íocfaiḋ an binse as costais dlí a ṫiteann ar ḋuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
